summary: An Ordinance approving the assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 1245, for the improvement of Fourth Avenue North, from Harrison Street to Prospect Street, and Prospect Street, from Fourth Avenue North to Second Avenue North, all in the City of Seattle, by constructing therein watermains of proper dimensions, together with such gates, tees, crosses, five-hydrants, and other appurtenances as may be necessary for the reasonable water service and fire protection of said district under Ordinance No. 13651 and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel and lot of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
